#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
#define MOD  1000000007
typedef long long ll;
int main()
{ll t;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
    
    
    
                        ll n,m;
                        cin>>n>>m;
                        
                       ll val=1;
                        for(ll i=n;i>n-m;i--)
                        {val=val*i;
                                val=val%MOD;
                                }   
    cout<<val<<endl;
    
    
}  
 
 //   getch();
    return 0;
}
